answers.answer: If only it were true. I read the paper associated with the claim - it was a litany of unscientific claims. It was not clear whether the patients were infected and of course whether the patients were then cured.
Sounds too good to be true.  There are some many types of  cancers.  Each response to different chemo drugs.  Hep B is again totally different.
